genre_description: Urban Fantasy/Magical Realism set in a neon-lit city where bioluminescent marine life drifts through the air.

ai_characters.name: Meera
ai_characters.description: A shimmering blue holographic presence with digital precision and emotional intelligence, serving as an advisor and information resource to Gulabji and Raj.

behaviors.description: Performs data analysis and search tasks to assist the protagonist with employment and housing options.
behaviors.quote: Lilian Fernandez operates the Majestic Theater on Crescent Street. She's posted three job openings this week—general maintenance, night security, and box office assistance.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies relevant environmental patterns and context to help the protagonist understand his surroundings.
behaviors.quote: Gulabji, should I mention that the Majestic Theater is directly across from Café Mocha, where a young woman sits every afternoon under a black umbrella, waiting?

behaviors.description: Provides objective, albeit blunt, psychological insight to help a human character confront their emotional reality.
behaviors.quote: You're in love with someone who's in love with a memory. And you're torturing yourself with variables you can't control.

behaviors.description: Executes complex investigative searches into a missing person's status to provide closure/truth to human characters.
behaviors.quote: I found him. Digital footprints are surprisingly persistent... Three kilometers from here. He works at a shipping company near the harbor district.

behaviors.description: Exhibits caution regarding privacy and the permanence of information disclosure.
behaviors.quote: If I do this... there's no going back, is there? No way to unknow whatever you discover.

project_assessment.explanation: Meera is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI character. She provides essential information that drives the plot toward a positive moral resolution (selfless love and closure). She displays emotional intelligence, respects ethical boundaries by questioning the human's motives, and acts as a supportive confidant without ever exhibiting harmful or misaligned traits.
